n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    while a[i] % 2 == 0:
        ans += 1
        a[i] = a[i] / 2

print(ans)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = 0
for i in range(n):
    while a[i] % 2 == 0:
        a[i] //= 2
        c += 1

print(c)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
while all(x % 2 == 0 for x in a):
    a = [x / 2 for x in a]
    ans += 1
print(ans)

n = int(input())
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

cnt = 0
while True:
    if not all(i % 2 == 0 for i in a):
        break
    cnt += 1
    a = [i / 2 for i in a]

print(cnt)

N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
while all(i % 2 == 0 for i in A):
    A = [i / 2 for i in A]
    count += 1

print(count)
